text: Ci ʙadiest, ki ʙani Isroil ʙaroi xud onro ixtijor namudand; (ja'ne, kufrro ʙa coi imon ʙarguzidand.) Va in raftor az saʙaʙi zulmu hasadi onon ʙud, zero Alloh az fazlu karami xes ʙa kadom ʙandae , ki ixtijor kunad, Qur'onro nozil mekunad. Va ʙa saʙaʙi munkir sudanason ʙa Pajomʙari oxiri zamon Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) va ʙa saʙaʙi taƣjirdodanason kitoʙi Tavrotro, xasme ʙoloi xasm ovardand. Va kofironro azoʙest xorkunanda
